Function to plot autocorrelation of neuron

plot-autocorrelation.Rd

Wrapper function to fetch and plot autocorrelation information from a neuron object. Assumes the autocorrelation has already been computed.

Usage

plot.autocorrelation(nrn, plot_title = "Est. autocorr", bias_term = 0, plot_time_cutoff = Inf)

Arguments

nrn

Neuron object for which to plot autocorrelation.

plot_title

Title for the plot (default: "Est. autocorr").

bias_term

Bias term to plot as a horizontal line (default: 0).

plot_time_cutoff

Maximum lag (in bins) to display on the x-axis (default: Inf).

Value

A ggplot object showing the estimated and fitted autocorrelation.
